tool_description: This API returns all sorts of data f.e. Current World Population,  Deaths this year,  CO2 emissions,  Social Media statistics etc.  All in all it returns 60 values on following topics:  World Population,  Economics, Media, Environment, Food, Water, Energy and Health. Data provided by https://www.worldometers.info/
name: Live World Data
title: Live World Data

api_list.name: Get by category
api_list.description:
Categorys:
Population
Economics
Media
Environment
Food
Water
Energy
Health
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-world-data.p.rapidapi.com/category/Water"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-world-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-world-data.p.rapidapi.com/category/{category}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-world-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-world-data.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-world-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
